context: Hello what kind of movies would you recommend me to watched with my friends?
Hello, there is a movie that I have always enjoyed and I'm not sure what you would call the genre but the movie is Donnie Darko (2001) have you ever seen this one?
i think funny movies would be great Yes i watched it! it was really great!
resp: Well that one definitely isn't funny. How about Black Sheep (1996) or another classic Uncle Buck

context.content: Hello what kind of movies would you recommend me to watched with my friends?
Hello, there is a movie that I have always enjoyed and I'm not sure what you would call the genre but the movie is Donnie Darko (2001) have you ever seen this one?
i think funny movies would be great Yes i watched it! it was really great!
Great! Since you enjoy funny movies, can you tell me if you prefer comedies that are more light-hearted, or do you enjoy dark humor as well?

I really enjoy light-hearted comedies! They always bring a good laugh and are perfect for watching with friends. One that comes to mind features a character who is quite the misfit and gets into all sorts of hilarious situations while trying to help his family. Another one has a lovable uncle who takes care of his niece and nephew in a very unconventional way, leading to some memorable and funny moments. Both are great for a fun movie night!

I would recommend the following items: 1: Uncle Buck
2: The Comedy (2012)
3: The Comedian (2016)
4: A Night in Casablanca (1946)
5: Funny People (2009)
6: You Laugh (1998)
7: Elf (2003)
8: Auntie Mame (1958)
9: The Tooth Fairy (2006)
10: Lucy (2003)
11: Twitches
12: The Perfect Holiday (2007)
13: The Honeymooners (2005)
14: Get Smart (2008)
15: My Cousin Vinny (1992)
16: Annie (1982)
17: Annie (2014)
18: The Intern (2015)
19: Little Nicky (2000)
20: Annie Hall (1977)
21: Like Mike (2002)
22: Uncle Brian (2010)
23: A Goofy Movie (1995)
24: The Night Before (2015)
25: It's Kind of a Funny Story (2010)
26: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events (2004)
27: Bedtime Stories (2008)
28: Fred Claus (2007)
29: Jack (1996)
30: The 'Burbs (1989)
31: Tinker Bell
32: Tinker Bell
33: I Heart Huckabees (2004)
34: Grandma's Boy (2006)
35: Superbad (2007)
36: Easy A (2010)
37: The Dark Knight Trilogy
38: Heavyweights (1995)
39: The Odd Couple (1968)
40: Night at the Museum
41: Mosquito (1995)
42: Ella Enchanted (2004)
43: A Scanner Darkly (2006)
44: An Extremely Goofy Movie (2000)
45: My Girl 2 (1994)
46: The Odd Life of Timothy Green (2012)
47: The Holiday (2006)
48: The Sunshine Boys (1975)
49: The To Do List (2013)
50: The Change-Up (2011)
:Thanks for sharing your preferences! Based on your love for light-hearted comedies, here are some recommendations for you and your friends:

1. The Grand Budapest Hotel
2. Superbad
3. The 40-Year-Old Virgin
4. Crazy, Stupid, Love
5. Ferris Bueller's Day Off
6. Pitch Perfect
7. Step Brothers
8. The Intern
9. Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
10. Zombieland

I appreciate your suggestions, but I really enjoy light-hearted comedies that feature a character who is quite the misfit and gets into all sorts of hilarious situations while trying to help his family. Another one that stands out has a lovable uncle who takes care of his niece and nephew in a very unconventional way, leading to some memorable and funny moments. Those types of movies are perfect for a fun movie night!
